page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The two main{villages}in our block are{Bicknoller}and{Sampford Brett.} There are a lot of{farms}such as Sampford Mill Farm, Torweston, Vellow Wood , Upcott Farm (Warren Meat)etc. { Woolston}is on the outskirts of Sampford Brett. It is said to be a place where gypsys used to camp . In{Bicknoller}there is a inn but no shops. Opposite this is a carpark.On the outskirts of Bicknoller is a disused Quarry and Bicknoller Combe. In the Combe deer are often seen. Running through the block is the {West Somerset Railway.}a great tourist attraction with its steam engines. There are 2{Churches,}one in each village, both are very beautiful. In{Vellow}there is a pottery called Vellow Pottery.At Kilnridge there is a covered reservoir.
